body.p: I received your letter today & was verryvery glad to hear from you wonseonce more I have bin wounded again but it has got well it hit me in the right thigh this time I have had A pretty hard time of it this summer A marching & fighting together

dear waltWalt I am so glad to hear from you once more I would like to see you verryvery much
I have dremptdreamt of you often & thought of you oftener still

I expect to leave here tomorrow morning for Carlisle barraksbarracks I was to gowgo this morning but did not & now I am to gowgo tomorrow morning I guess that they wont put it off annyany longer my time is out in eleven days now I have bin home on A furlowfurlough I shantshan't have to do annyany more fighting I think

closer.salute: Write soon no more at present thew

postscript.p:
Address
Bethuel Smith Co. F. US. Cav. Carlisle, Barracks. Penn
